General.Name: ShipChain
General.Description:
ShipChain is an Ethereum-based shipment tracker platform. The ShipChain system is fully integrated across the entire supply chain, from the moment a shipment leaves the factory, to the final delivery on the customer's doorstep. TheÂ ecosystem will encompass all methods of freight, and will include an open API architecture that can integrate with existing freight management software.

SHIP is an ERC20 token that serves as a currency on ShipChain's ecosystem.
